import React from 'react'; import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; import profilePic from '../images/luciano.jpg'; import './AboutMe.css'; export default function AboutMe() { const getAge = () => { const day = currentTime.getDate() const month = currentTime.getMonth() + 1 const year = new Date().getFullYear(); const birthYear = 1994; const age = (day < 8 && month < 1) ? (year - birthYear - 1) : (year - birthYear); return age; } return (
